data.name: Ikaris
data.description: The Eternal Ikaris strafes foes with laser vision and uses super strength to slam down on them, fighting even more intensely when allied with Sersi.

starItems.name: Ikaris
starItems.description: The Eternal Ikaris strafes foes with laser vision and uses super strength to slam down on them, fighting even more intensely when allied with Sersi.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>80%</color> Piercing. If Sersi is an ally, Bonus Attack for <color=#86e619>60%</color> Piercing.

Apply <color=#fff568>Assist Now</color> to a random Sersi ally.

When forced to attack an ally, this character deals less damage to <color=#fff568>ETERNAL</color> characters.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing on all attacks
If an ally Sersi has <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health or greater, apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to that Sersi
If an ally Sersi is below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health, apply <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to that Sersi

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> Piercing. If Sersi is an ally, Bonus Attack for <color=#86e619>80%</color> Piercing.

If an ally Sersi has <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health or greater, apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to that Sersi. If an ally Sersi is below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health, apply <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to that Sersi.

Apply <color=#fff568>Assist Now</color> to a random Sersi ally.

When forced to attack an ally, this character deals less damage to <color=#fff568>ETERNAL</color> characters.

3.description:

If an ally Sersi has <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health or greater, apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to that Sersi. If an ally Sersi is below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health, apply <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to that Sersi.

Apply <color=#fff568>Assist Now</color> to a random Sersi ally.

When forced to attack an ally, this character deals less damage to <color=#fff568>ETERNAL</color> characters.

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>150%</color> Piercing. If Sersi is an ally, Bonus Attack for <color=#86e619>130%</color> Piercing.

If an ally Sersi has <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health or greater, apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to that Sersi. If an ally Sersi is below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health, apply <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to that Sersi.

Apply <color=#fff568>Assist Now</color> to a random Sersi ally.

When forced to attack an ally, this character deals less damage to <color=#fff568>ETERNAL</color> characters.

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>180%</color> Piercing. If Sersi is an ally, Bonus Attack for <color=#86e619>160%</color> Piercing.

If an ally Sersi has <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health or greater, apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> to that Sersi. If an ally Sersi is below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health, apply <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to that Sersi.

Apply <color=#fff568>Assist Now</color> to a random Sersi ally.

When forced to attack an ally, this character deals less damage to <color=#fff568>ETERNAL</color> characters.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> Piercing on all attacks
Apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns
Apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>220%</color> Piercing. If Sersi is an ally, Bonus Attack for <color=#86e619>200%</color> Piercing.

If an ally Sersi has <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health or greater, apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to that Sersi. If an ally Sersi is below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health, apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to that Sersi.

Apply <color=#fff568>Assist Now</color> to a random Sersi ally.

When forced to attack an ally, this character deals less damage to <color=#fff568>ETERNAL</color> characters.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>60%</color> Piercing to primary target
If Sersi is an ally, Bonus Attack <color=#86e619>2</color> times

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>280%</color> Piercing. If Sersi is an ally, Bonus Attack <color=#86e619>2</color> times for <color=#86e619>200%</color> Piercing.

If an ally Sersi has <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health or greater, apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to that Sersi. If an ally Sersi is below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health, apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to that Sersi.

Apply <color=#fff568>Assist Now</color> to <color=#86e619>1</color> random Sersi ally.

When forced to attack an ally, this character deals less damage to <color=#fff568>ETERNAL</color> characters.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage + clear <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>. Gain <color=#86e619>5,000%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.
Attack all adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>70%</color> damage.

On target Block, Bonus Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>50%</color> Piercing. Maximum of <color=#86e619>2</color> Bonus Attacks.

Gain an Assist from a random Sersi ally.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> Piercing on all Bonus Attacks
Gain <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>130%</color> damage + clear <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>. Gain <color=#86e619>5,000%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.
Attack all adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage.

On target Block, Bonus Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>80%</color> Piercing. Maximum of <color=#86e619>2</color> Bonus Attacks.

Gain <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>.
Gain an Assist from a random Sersi ally.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> Piercing on all Bonus Attacks

3.description:

Attack all adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>130%</color> damage.

On target Block, Bonus Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>110%</color> Piercing. Maximum of <color=#86e619>2</color> Bonus Attacks.

Gain <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>.
Gain an Assist from a random Sersi ally.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>60%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> Piercing on all Bonus Attacks
Apply <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> to a random Sersi ally

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>220%</color> damage + clear <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>. Gain <color=#86e619>5,000%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.
Attack all adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>190%</color> damage.

Apply <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> to this character and a random Sersi ally.
Gain an Assist from a random Sersi ally.
4.nextUpgrade:

+<color=#86e619>40%</color> Piercing on all Bonus Attacks
<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to gain an Assist from a random ally

<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to gain an Assist from a random ally.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>80%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
+<color=#86e619>60%</color> Piercing on all Bonus Attacks
Always gain an Assist from a random ally

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>420%</color> damage + clear <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>. Gain <color=#86e619>5,000%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.

1.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>70%</color> damage.
On Kill, repeat this attack.

If Sersi is an active ally, instead, attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>70%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing + reduce Speed Bar for all enemies by <color=#86e619>25%</color>.
On Kill, attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>70%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing.

These attacks cannot be dodged or blocked.

2.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage.
On Kill, repeat this attack.

If Sersi is an active ally, instead, attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing + reduce Speed Bar for all enemies by <color=#86e619>25%</color>.
On Kill, attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing.

These attacks cannot be dodged or blocked.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage on all attacks
If Sersi is an active ally flip <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects on each enemy
Gain +<color=#86e619>500%</color> Extra Focus for this action

3.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>130%</color> damage.
On Kill, repeat this attack.

If Sersi is an active ally:
 > Flip <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects to negative effects on each enemy. Gain +<color=#86e619>500%</color> Extra Focus for this action.
 > Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>130%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing + reduce Speed Bar for all enemies by <color=#86e619>25%</color> instead.
 > On Kill, attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>130%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing.

These attacks cannot be dodged or blocked.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage on all attacks
If Sersi is an active ally, +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Piercing on all attacks

4.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>180%</color> damage.
On Kill, repeat this attack.

If Sersi is an active ally:
 > Flip <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects to negative effects on each enemy. Gain +<color=#86e619>500%</color> Extra Focus for this action.
 > Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>180%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>30%</color> Piercing + reduce Speed Bar for all enemies by <color=#86e619>25%</color> instead.
 > On Kill, attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>180%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>30%</color> Piercing.

These attacks cannot be dodged or blocked.

5.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>230%</color> damage.
On Kill, repeat this attack.

If Sersi is an active ally:
 > Flip <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects to negative effects on each enemy. Gain +<color=#86e619>500%</color> Extra Focus for this action.
 > Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>230%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>30%</color> Piercing + reduce Speed Bar for all enemies by <color=#86e619>25%</color> instead.
 > On Kill, attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>230%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>30%</color> Piercing.

These attacks cannot be dodged or blocked.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>70%</color> damage on all attacks
If Sersi is an active ally, +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Piercing on all attacks

6.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage.
On Kill, repeat this attack.

If Sersi is an active ally:
 > Flip <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects to negative effects on each enemy. Gain +<color=#86e619>500%</color> Extra Focus for this action.
 > Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>40%</color> Piercing + reduce Speed Bar for all enemies by <color=#86e619>25%</color> instead.
 > On Kill, attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>40%</color> Piercing.

These attacks cannot be dodged or blocked.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>100%</color> damage on all attacks
If Sersi is an active ally, flip all positive effects to negative effects on each enemy

7.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>400%</color> damage.
On Kill, repeat this attack.

If Sersi is an active ally:
 > Flip all positive effects to negative effects on each enemy. Gain +<color=#86e619>500%</color> Extra Focus for this action.
 > Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>400%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>40%</color> Piercing + reduce Speed Bar for all enemies by <color=#86e619>25%</color> instead.
 > On Kill, attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>400%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>40%</color> Piercing.

These attacks cannot be dodged or blocked.

1.description:
If this character's Health is full at the start of a match, the first time this character drops below <color=#86e619>40%</color> Health, clear all negative effects on this character + Heal self for <color=#86e619>60%</color> of this character's Max Health.

On Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>ETERNAL</color> allies. In <color=#fff568>ARENA</color> or <color=#fff568>DARK DIMENSION</color>, instead apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all allies.

On Turn, if not stunned, clear <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> and <color=#86e619>1</color> random negative effect from self, Sersi allies, and the most injured ally.
On Turn, if not stunned, gain <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns then choose <color=#86e619>1</color> random enemy that has <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>. Clear <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> on that enemy, then apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>,  to self and all <color=#fff568>ETERNAL</color> allies.
1.nextUpgrade:
Gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Armor
Sersi allies gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Armor

2.description:
If this character's Health is full at the start of a match, the first time this character drops below <color=#86e619>40%</color> Health, clear all negative effects on this character + Heal self for <color=#86e619>60%</color> of this character's Max Health.

On Spawn, apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>ETERNAL</color> allies. In <color=#fff568>ARENA</color> or <color=#fff568>DARK DIMENSION</color>, instead apply <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all allies.

On Turn, if not stunned, clear <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> and <color=#86e619>1</color> random negative effect from self, Sersi allies, and the most injured ally.
On Turn, if not stunned, gain <color=#fff568>Defense Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns then choose <color=#86e619>1</color> random enemy that has <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>. Clear <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> on that enemy, then apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>,  to self and all <color=#fff568>ETERNAL</color> allies.

Gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Armor. Sersi allies gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Armor.
2.nextUpgrade:
On Turn, if Sersi is an ally, heal for <color=#86e619>15%</color> Max Health
Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Resistance for self and Sersi allies

On Turn, gain <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns
In <color=#fff568>DARK DIMENSION</color> and <color=#fff568>ARENA</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Damage for self and Sersi allies
